definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
Chinese scholar tree (Sophora japonica)/Japanese pagoda tree

sentences.english: The geometrid Apocheima sp. is one of the worst pest of the locust tree in Mei County.
sentences.chinese: 刺槐尺蠖是陝西省眉縣地區刺槐林的主要害蟲。

sentences.english: The geometrid Apocheima sp. is one of the worst pest of the locust tree in Mei County.
sentences.chinese: 刺槐尺蠖是陝西省眉縣地區刺槐林的主要害蟲。

sentences.english: With the method of drying by silica gel, Robinia pseudoacacia seed of Yan an City and Wuqi City were dried from 6.
sentences.chinese: 採用硅膠室溫乾燥法，延安種源刺槐種子含水量由6。

sentences.english: Suggesting responses to the high CO2 concentration that Robinnia pseudoscacia and Sophorajaponica were the best apparent.
sentences.chinese: 其中刺槐和國槐對高CO2濃度的響應最爲顯著。

sentences.english: The advances on the propagation technology and adaptability of Robinia pseudoacacia L. were given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對刺槐的繁殖技術及適應性進行了綜述。

sentences.english: He makes his way over to a chair under an acacia, and I follow him.
sentences.chinese: 他走向一張放在刺槐底下的椅子，我跟着他。

sentences.english: Guar gum and locust bean gum could promote the stability of pectin on fruit juice milk.
sentences.chinese: 瓜爾豆膠和刺槐豆膠對果膠有增效作用。

sentences.english: Wearing a brown cotton gown, he sat beneath acacia and zizyphus trees that shaded a pen holding guinea fowl.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一身褐色棉長袍，坐在刺槐與棗樹下。

sentences.english: Water is a main factor affecting locust growth.
sentences.chinese: 水是影響黃土高原地區刺槐生長的主要因子。

sentences.english: Native to North America, this species attacks leaf of black locust tree, Robinia pseudoacacia L.
sentences.chinese: 該害蟲原產北美洲東部，危害刺槐葉片。

sentences.english: Robinia Pseudoacacia is a deep root tree.
sentences.chinese: 刺槐在遺傳特性上表現爲深根性樹種。

sentences.english: A nightingale comes to the clump of acacias opposite your windows, every spring.
sentences.chinese: 每年春天，在您窗前刺槐的花叢裏會飛來一隻黃鶯。

definition: Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
poplar tree/various trees of genus Populus
